page.title: 02Church Hill - a new estate.
page.content: {Church Hill}was started to be built in 1975 on farm land. Church Hill is now fully built and maturing. The old village of{Beoley,}with{St. Leonard's {Church}on the hill, overlooks Church Hill. From the seat in my classroom I can see the surrounding countryside. Many trees, hedges and pools have been left from the old fields. This has helped the new housing look more established. Some new roads follow the routes of farm tracks and part of the old{Icknield Street}has been made into a footpath through the estate. Several old buildings have been retained. The {Marlfield Barn}has been converted into a community centre by the{Residents' {Association.}Old houses have been incorporated into the new{Y.M.C.A. housing complex, and an old marl pool included in the design of the local shopping centre.
